item.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 23, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Jan 27, 23:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 05:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured).

Mar 9, 22:00 UTC

item.title: [RBX2][DedicatedServers] - Rack 24C06
item.description:
Mar 9, 21:12 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 09/03/2023 21:05 UTC
Start time : 09/03/2023 21:10 UTC
Service impact : Public network was down for all servers.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
